text_block_list.text: A few days after Mejiro McQueen's amazing victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.
The situation revolving around our weak, one member team changed in an instant.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san, the way you run is so mesmerizing! I look forward to working with you!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Gasp… I'm so… Proud of your accomplishments… Uuh… It's was so… moving…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Th-Thank you…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: I'm going to do my best to make sure my dreams come true just like you, McQueen-chan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Y-Yes… Good luck.
It seems like they've all been charmed by the way you run, McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Um… It's kind of embarrassing…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, what was my time?
6 furlongs in about 80 seconds! I have no complaints!
6 furlongs in about 80 seconds! I have no complaints!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: Amazing! Those are the legs of the winner of the Spring Tennō Shō!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: J-Jeez… Please stop that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That being said, it's been quite some time since I've been able to train with others. I've truly missed it.
This is all thanks to your victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.
This is all thanks to your victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Winning really turned things around for us, didn't it…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Anyways, now we are one step closer to being recognized as a full-fledged team!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san, could you teach me about proper running form?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course, I don't mind one bit.

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san, could you teach me how to properly exit the starting gate?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There's a trick to that. Here, let me show you.
McQueen, I'm hungry! Treat me to some carrot cake!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'll get you one as soon as possible.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wait… Who said that!? Who is trying to take advantage of the situation!?
It's me, it's me! Yo, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: G-Gold Ship-san…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You could say she's someone I know… but it's more like I constantly get involved with her for whatever reason…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I watched your race during the Spring Tennō Shō! It was amazing!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Especially when you took the enemies' attack to protect your friends! I'll never forget it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I never did anything of the sort! And what do you even mean by the enemies' attacks anyways!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey now, don't sweat the small stuff! Anyways, that was an amazing race. It was really moving.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And that's why I came here! To see more of your amazingness!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I see no issue with you just watching, however… please don't get in my way.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Okay okay! I'll sit quietly and watch, so there's no need to worry about that.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Okay everyone, look over here! McQueen is about to show off her true power! To start with, she'll eat some nigiri sushi with lots of wasabi!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I won't be doing that!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haa… Today was so exhausting…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You're probably still exhausted from the Tennō Shō…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Do you have no self-awareness? I'm exhausted because you were involved/because of you. Jeez…
But what she said is right. That race was not too long ago, so let's take it easy for now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I agree, but we mustn't lose sight of the upcoming races either…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Even though I won the Tennō Shō, I've still got plenty of races left to do.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wow, despite achieving your goal you're just as motivated as ever.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well of course. There is no limit to the number of honours that the Mejiro Family can be graced with.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Plus I have a responsibility to liven up this team as well.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Are you being serious…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course I am being serious! Why would I mess around now of all times!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hehe… I'm glad to see you're still excited to be running.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Alrighty then, I've decided to join this team! A new member has joined, make sure to welcome them!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh…!?
Thanks to the success of Mejiro McQueen, plenty of things happened in quick succession, and with this many members…
choice_data_list: We won't have to break up the team!
We won't have to break up the team!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's great, congrats! Although I have no idea what you're talking about…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Will this team really be okay…?
This team may have been hastily assembled, but I have confidence that this team will be great.
This team may have been hastily assembled, but I have confidence that this team will be great.
Because at the center of this team is Mejiro McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Okay Team McQueen, let's set sail!
